testsuite.name: tetris.ClearLinesTests

testcase.name: testClear1Line

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=4, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .SS | .SS SS. | SS. ... | ... ... | ... ZZ. | ...
step=1, rand=4, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .S. | .S. .SS | .SS ..S | ..S ... | ... ZZ. | ...
step=2, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ... | ... .S. | .S. .SS | .SS ..S | ..S ZZ. | ...
step=3, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ... | ... ... | ... .S. | .S. .SS | .SS ZZS | ..S
step=4, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .SS | ... SS. | ... ... | ... .S. | .S. .SS | .SS

testcase.name: testClear1LineMiddle

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | IIII .... | .... .... | .... .Z.. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. .Z.. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I .Z.. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=3, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I .Z.I | ...I .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I .Z.I | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZ. | .... ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I .Z.I | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I ZZ.. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .Z.I | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I ZZ.I | ...I Z.Z. | ....
step=7, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .Z.. | .... .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I ZZ.I | ...I Z.ZI | ...I
step=8, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .Z.. | .... .Z.I | ...I ZZ.I | ...I Z.ZI | ...I

testcase.name: testClear2Lines

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | IIII .... | .... .... | .... ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=3, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZ. | .... Z.Z. | ....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I Z.Z. | ....
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I Z.ZI | ...I
step=7, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | ...I .Z.I | ...I Z.ZI | ...I

testcase.name: testClear3Lines

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | IIII .... | .... .... | .... ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZZ. | ....
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZZ. | ....
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZ. | .... .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZZ. | ....
step=3, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.. | .... ZZZ. | .... ZZZ. | ....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZ. | .... ZZZ. | ....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ...I | ...I ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I ZZZ. | ....
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ZZZI | ...I .Z.I | ...I ZZZI | ...I ZZZI | ...I
step=7, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | ...I .... | ...I .Z.I | ...I

testcase.name: testClear4Lines

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | IIII .... | .... ...O | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..I. | ..I. ..IO | ..I. Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Left> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .I.. | .I.. .I.. | .I.. .I.. | .I.. .I.O | .I.. Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=3, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .I.. | .I.. .I.. | .I.. .I.O | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .I.. | .I.. .I.O | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. Z.ZZ | .... Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .I.O | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. Z.ZZ | .... .ZZZ | ....
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... ...O | .... ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. ZIZZ | .I.. .ZZZ | ....
step=7, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | .... IIII | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .... .... | .I.. .... | .I.. ...O | .I.. .ZZZ | .I..
